alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Harrison; Rusk; Smith; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 2:44AM CDT until June 16 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Smith County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Harrison County in northeastern Texas... Northern Rusk County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Wood County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Upshur County in northeastern Texas... Gregg County in northeastern Texas... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 244 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hawkins, or 14 miles east of Mineola, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Large hail was reported in and near Mineola with this storm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Longview, Kilgore, White Oak, Gladewater, Lindale, Hallsville, Big Sandy, Hawkins, New London, Clarksville City, East Mountain, Liberty City, West Mountain, Lakeport, Winona, Easton, Union Grove, Warren City, Rolling Meadows and Stewart. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Gregg; Harrison; Rusk; Smith; Upshur; Wood
